internal.content:
---
title: IBM Fusion AI
description: IBM Fusion AI provides  .
tabs: [Overview, Tutorials, Resources]
---

import { principlesSection } from '../../styles/Grid.module.scss';
import {StorageForDataAndAi, AiReady, Ai, CodeSyntax, Insights, DoorHandle, BuildAndDeployPipeline, Racetrack } from '@carbon/pictograms-react';

![IBM Fusion AI](../../images/homepage/fusion_ai.jpg)

<Row className={principlesSection}>
<Column colMd={1} colLg={1}>

<AiReady aria-label="FusionForAI" className="my-custom-class" />

</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={10}>

IBM Fusion, IBM’s AI platform is designed to accelerate development, simplify operations, and ready your data for your AI applications.  

Simply put, IBM Fusion is a proven application and data services platform built for AI, analytics, and modernization workloads—running 
natively with Red Hat OpenShift. Fusion eliminates the traditional complexity of designing and integrating infrastructure by delivering 
a fully engineered system that arrives from the factory pre‑assembled, pre‑cabled, and pre‑validated across compute, storage, networking, 
and GPU acceleration.  A turnkey AI system delivering the fastest time to inference with your own data from day one
 
Here’s what it helps you to unlock:
- Accelerated AI outcomes 
- Cloud Like Agility  
- Total operational visibility 
- Reduce Risk with Built in Resiliency

</Column>

</Row>

<Row className={principlesSection}>
<Column colMd={1} colLg={1}>

<BuildAndDeployPipeline aria-label="Buid" className="my-custom-class" />

</Column>
<Column colMd={6} colLg={8}>

## Buid

Enable your developers to build next generation application power by AI.  Allow them to have access to models, GitOps, Access to Data services.

</Column>
</Row>

<Row className={principlesSection}>
<Column colMd={1} colLg={1}>

<Racetrack aria-label="Run" className="my-custom-class" />

</Column>
<Column colMd={6} colLg={8}>

## Run

SRE, ADministrators and DecOps teams can operatate AI applications and enable services for developers.  Using Model as a Service, Moedl Serving, GPU as a Service, Data as a service.

</Column>
</Row>

<Row className={principlesSection}>
<Column colMd={1} colLg={1}>

<StorageForDataAndAi aria-label="BringYourData" className="my-custom-class" />

</Column>
<Column colMd={6} colLg={8}>

## Bring your data

New applications need access to unstructure content, enable access to enterprise content differnet dataservices. 

</Column>
</Row>


<Row className={principlesSection}>
<Column colMd={1} colLg={1}>

<Insights aria-label="Insights" className="my-custom-class" />

</Column>
<Column colMd={6} colLg={8}>

**Learn and enable AI with IBM Fusion for AI.**

Explore curated tutorials, technical blogs, and best practices to help developers, platform administrators, and DevOps/MLOps teams build,
 deploy, and operate AI workloads at scale.

Bellow are your starting points:
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="square-card-group">
  <Column colMd={1} colLg={1}>
  </Column>
  <SquareCard
    title="Tutorials"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="/fusion-ai/tutorials"
    bodyText="Hands‑on tutorials for IBM Fusion for AI, guiding developers and platform teams through real‑world deployment and operations workflows."
    >
    <CodeSyntax aria-label="Provision" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>
  <SquareCard
    title="Resources"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="/fusion-ai/resources"
    bodyText="Articles, blogs, and videos sharing insights, best practices, and real‑world experiences with IBM Fusion for AI."
    >
    <DoorHandle aria-label="Resources" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

</Row>

<Column colMd={4} colLg={10}>

IBM Fusion, IBM’s AI platform is designed to accelerate development, simplify operations, and ready your data for your AI applications.  

Simply put, IBM Fusion is a proven application and data services platform built for AI, analytics, and modernization workloads—running

</Row>
